SEARCH
Package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model

Class Flight

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Flight
public class Flight extends Object
The Flight class represents a flight in the flight booking system. It includes details such as the flight's ID, flight number, origin, destination, departure date, number of seats, price, and the passengers booked on the flight.

      flightNumber - The flight number.
      origin - The origin of the flight.
      destination - The destination of the flight.
      departureDate - The departure date of the flight.
      numberOfSeats - The total number of seats available on the flight.
      price - The price of the flight.

    • hasNotDeparted

      public boolean hasNotDeparted(LocalDate systemDate)
      Checks if the flight has not yet departed.
      Parameters:
      systemDate - The current system date.
      Returns:
      True if the flight has not yet departed, otherwise false.

    • calculatePrice

      public int calculatePrice(LocalDate currentDate) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Calculates the price of the flight based on the current date and the number of available seats.
      Parameters:
      currentDate - The current date.
      Returns:
      The calculated price.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If there are no available seats for booking.

    • isFullyBooked

      public boolean isFullyBooked()
      Checks if the flight is fully booked.
      Returns:
      True if the flight is fully booked, otherwise false.
